attributes.action: grant the individuals who make up our Armed Forces a bonus for Christmas Service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With a number of friends, colleagues and acquaintances who have sons, daughters, brothers, sisters, mothers and fathers away at war this Christmas I would like to see this country demonstrate our support for our service personnel with some form of Christmas Service bonus.

They are paid little enough for the service they provide and their families are simply expected to endure them being away.  It will not make up for absence but will demonstrate that the people of Britain have not forgot their covenent with our military.
